dt: {bc}to go beyond in action or performance

pt: {sc}exceed{/sc} {sc}surpass{/sc} {sc}transcend{/sc} {sc}excel{/sc} {sc}outdo{/sc} {sc}outstrip{/sc} mean to go or be beyond a stated or implied limit, measure, or degree. {sc}exceed{/sc} implies going beyond a limit set by authority or established by custom or by prior achievement.
{sc}surpass{/sc} suggests superiority in quality, merit, or skill.
{sc}transcend{/sc} implies a rising or extending notably above or beyond ordinary limits.
{sc}excel{/sc} implies preeminence in achievement or quality and may suggest superiority to all others.
{sc}outdo{/sc} applies to a bettering or exceeding what has been done before.
{sc}outstrip{/sc} suggests surpassing in a race or competition.

shortdef: to go beyond in action or performance
